checks.message: The FASTQ files failed to validate for the following reasons : Line #75 within FASTQ file C0HVY.2_r1.invalid.fq.bz2 not following FASTQ format, missing '+' at start of the line;Line #13 within FASTQ file C0HVY.2_r2.invalid.fq.bz2 not following FASTQ format, missing '@' at the start of the line;The FASTQ file pair 'C0HVY.2_r1.invalid.fq.bz2' and 'C0HVY.2_r2.invalid.fq.bz2' do not have matching line counts

The fileSize calculated from the sequencing files does NOT match the info provided in metadata JSON. Details of the difference: [C0HVY.2_r1.invalid.fq.bz2: fileSize: 1955 vs 2001]; [C0HVY.2_r2.invalid.fq.bz2: fileSize: 2014 vs 2034]

The fileMd5sum calculated from the sequencing files does NOT match the info provided in metadata JSON. Details of the difference: [C0HVY.2_r1.invalid.fq.bz2: fileMd5sum: 5aa3fb067ac33557cf7a7ebd80bce156 vs ad7f4f429506a8def523f068c60d2305]; [C0HVY.2_r2.invalid.fq.bz2: fileMd5sum: 942f4a5a2ff2f64f0737ddbf25582fbf vs 9a3f32c80aff08e56965a6fd6dbb4d1f]
